Description: Hippopotamus ivory wand; incised representations of deities.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: PM I Part 2: p.842 G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.19, 20 (lower). J. Roberson 'The Early History of "New Kingdom" Netherworld Iconography: A Late Middle Kingdom Apotropaic Wand Reconsidered' in D Silverman et al (ed.), Archaisism and Innovation: Studies in the Culture of Middle Kingdom Egypt , 427-45 (New Haven and Philadelphia 2009).
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 6)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1977 London, BM, Animals in Art 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
